title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 224.7 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 224.7 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations

All records required or maintained under this Part, whether by a producer, an insurer, or other person shall be maintained in accordance with Part 243 of this Title (Insurance Regulation 152). Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
224.7

Renumbered
from 224.6

New

York State Register August 1, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 31, eff. 8/1/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
